name: FLÜK
description:
WARNING
THIS GAME MAY CAUSE EPILEPSY
PLEASE BE SURE TO ENABLE EPILEPSY SAFE MODE IF YOU ARE SUBJECT TO SEIZURES OR HAVE A SENSIBILITY TO FLASHING LIGHTS.

Description :
Flük is a game about sidestepping.

In Flük, you don't progress.
You can only relive the same experience, again, and again, with some slight differences.

Flük. Is a state of mind.


Controls :
A/D or Left/Right arrow : Move
Spacebar : Jump
Esc : Go back to the menu
